project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a simple text-based game where the player can navigate through different rooms, pick up items, view their inventory, and encounter challenges.

task.name: Define the game structure and rooms
Create a system for picking up and using items
Implement an inventory system for the player
Design simple challenges for the player to encounter in the game
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
